name: Spy Farmer
description:
Welcome to Spy Farmer

In this game, you play as  a spy, who has set up an airship in order to farm for crops stolen from an evil megacorporation.

The game is set into two phases, Espionage, where the player explores the corporate owned farm in order to find seeds to steal, and Farming, where the player uses they found in order to farm for crops and gain money for farm expansions, and maybe something else too.

Sleeping in your bed allows your plants time to grow, and if you have stolen seeds, it will store them so that they can be used to plant new crops, and won't be lost if you are caught by the guards, in addition, seed locations that were stolen from will have new seeds for you to find.

This game was made within 10 days for GBjam 10, where the theme of the jam was "Plant" I decided to take two of the meanings the jam page had suggested and combine them into one!

I might consider porting this project to another engine so that it could potentially become a more complete experience!

Controls Arrows = Move Z = Interact X = Open Menu, all buttons close the menu once opened.
